display_long_description:
# 🚨The Chain Mode Update is here!🚨
The long awaited Chain Mode is here! In the Prison Breakout stage you and one other player are chained together and it's time for a prison break!

Climb with one other player while chained together as you scale high-security walls, dodge deadly laser traps, and outwit the towering Prison Guard Crowbar Boy. Every step brings you closer to freedom… but will the chains help you, or hold you back?

Do you have what it takes to reach the summit and break free?

**This game is a challenge for all VR gamers who love physics and brain teasers.**
For VR gamers who are strong in both mind and arm... see you at the top!
[media]

# 💪Your hands are crowbars—ready to start climbing💪

In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up!
Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms.
Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?

[media]

# 🧗‍♂️Master the art of climbing through physics!🧗‍♀️

Control your environment and body using a crowbar that reacts to every move.
Grab hooks at the last second, launch yourself with powerful swings, and cling to ledges in creative ways.

[media]

# 📸Share your gameplay videos with friends!🎥

Record both first-person and third-person perspectives, just like in the promo video.

Show off your crowbar-climbing skills to friends or share on social media.


[media]

The long awaited Chain Mode is here! In the Prison Breakout stage you and one other player are chained together and it's time for a prison break!

Climb with one other player while chained together as you scale high-security walls, dodge deadly laser traps, and outwit the towering Prison Guard Crowbar Boy. Every step brings you closer to freedom… but will the chains help you, or hold you back?

# 💪Your hands are crowbars—ready to start climbing💪

In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up!
Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms.
Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-lga3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974783_1245640976757644_6511698305735211905_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=H1ypTgmtlI0Q7kNvwFfF6xZ&_nc_oc=AdnEHHuLZxmxKe0_Ylk2NnvLdg0Dc7ZM_gc5KYZ_nbI1SE5hTm6Zri-2ll9-2FQva1c&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-lga3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EirdaKMmhXn-_Jv0TiO8EA&oh=00_Afe3x3Xjj9C8-1sjZYwxoA4texIG_3IiJ246HmomvhxbZA&oe=68F43417)

# 🧗‍♂️Master the art of climbing through physics!🧗‍♀️

Control your environment and body using a crowbar that reacts to every move.
Grab hooks at the last second, launch yourself with powerful swings, and cling to ledges in creative ways.

# 📸Share your gameplay videos with friends!🎥

Record both first-person and third-person perspectives, just like in the promo video.

Show off your crowbar-climbing skills to friends or share on social media.
